00044 static unsigned int object_count = 0;
00045 
00046 EGS_Object::EGS_Object(const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00047     nref(0), otype("EGS_Object"), name(Name), factory(f) {
00048     object_count++;
00049     if (!name.size()) {
00050         name = getUniqueName(this);
00051     }
00052     //if( factory ) factory->addObject(this);
00053 }
00054 
00055 EGS_Object::EGS_Object(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00056     nref(0), otype("EGS_Object"), name(""), factory(f) {
00057     object_count++;
00058     setName(input);
00059     //if( factory ) factory->addObject(this);
00060 }
00061 
00062 EGS_Object::~EGS_Object() {
00063     //egsWarning("Destruncting object of type %s with name %s\n",
00064     //     otype.c_str(),name.c_str());
00065     if (factory) {
00066         factory->removeObject(this);
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void EGS_Object::setFactory(EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00071     if (f && f != factory) {
00072         if (factory) {
00073             factory->removeObject(this);
00074         }
00075         factory = f;
00076         factory->addObject(this);
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 string EGS_Object::getUniqueName(const EGS_Object *o) {
00081     char buf[256];
00082     if (o) {
00083         sprintf(buf,"%s_%d",o->getObjectType().c_str(),object_count);
00084     }
00085     else {
00086         sprintf(buf,"object_%d",object_count);
00087     }
00088     string result(buf);
00089     return result;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void EGS_Object::setName(EGS_Input *input) {
00093     int err = 1;
00094     if (input) {
00095         err = input->getInput("name",name);
00096     }
00097     if (err) {
00098         name = getUniqueName(this);
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 EGS_ObjectFactory::EGS_ObjectFactory(const string &dsoPath, int where) {
00103     //egsWarning("Creating object factory at 0x%x\n",this);
00104     if (egsIsAbsolutePath(dsoPath)) {
00105         dso_path = dsoPath;
00106     }
00107     else {
00108         static const char *locations[] = {"HEN_HOUSE","EGS_HOME"};
00109         int i = !where ? 0 : 1;
00110         char *loc = getenv(locations[i]);
00111         if (!loc)
00112             egsFatal("EGS_ObjectFactory: the environment variable "
00113                      "%s must be defined\n",locations[i]);
00114         dso_path = egsJoinPath(loc,dsoPath);
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 EGS_ObjectFactory::~EGS_ObjectFactory() {
00119     unsigned int j;
00120     //egsWarning("Destructing object factory at 0x%x\n",this);
00121     //egsWarning("  - destructing known objects\n");
00122     for (j=0; j<known_objects.size(); j++) {
00123         EGS_Object::deleteObject(known_objects[j]);
00124     }
00125     //egsWarning("  - destructing added objects, objects size is %d\n",
00126     //        objects.size());
00127     for (j=0; j<objects.size(); j++) {
00128         EGS_Object *o = objects[j];
00129         //egsWarning("Deleting object at 0x%x of type %s with name %s\n",
00130         //        o,o->getObjectType().c_str(),o->getObjectName().c_str());
00131         EGS_Object::deleteObject(o);
00132     }
00133     //egsWarning("  - unloading libraries\n");
00134     for (j=0; j<libs.size(); j++) {
00135         delete libs[j];
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void EGS_ObjectFactory::removeObject(EGS_Object *o) {
00140     for (vector<EGS_Object *>::iterator i = objects.begin();
00141             i != objects.end(); i++) {
00142         if (o == *i) {
00143             // why not calling o->deref() here ?
00144             objects.erase(i);
00145             break;
00146         }
00147     }
00148 }
00149 
00150 typedef EGS_Object *(*EGS_ObjectCreationFunction)(EGS_Input *,
00151         EGS_ObjectFactory *);
00152 
00153 EGS_Object *EGS_ObjectFactory::createObjects(EGS_Input *i,
00154         const string &section_delimeter, const string &object_delimeter,
00155         const string &select_key, const char *funcname, bool unique) {
00156     if (!i) {
00157         egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObjects(): null input?\n");
00158         return 0;
00159     }
00160     EGS_Input *input = i;
00161     if (!i->isA(section_delimeter)) {
00162         input = i->takeInputItem(section_delimeter);
00163         if (!input) {
00164             egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObjects(): the input is"
00165                        " not of type %s and also does not have items of this type\n",
00166                        section_delimeter.c_str());
00167             return 0;
00168         }
00169     }
00170     EGS_Input *ij;
00171     int errors = 0;
00172     while ((ij = input->takeInputItem(object_delimeter)) != 0) {
00173         EGS_Object *o = createSingleObject(ij,funcname,unique);
00174         if (!o) {
00175             errors++;
00176         }
00177         delete ij;
00178     }
00179     if (errors) egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObjects(): %d errors"
00180                                " occured while creating objects\n",errors);
00181     string sought_object;
00182     EGS_Object *o = 0;
00183     if (objects.size() > 0) {
00184         o = objects[objects.size()-1];
00185     }
00186     int err = input->getInput(select_key,sought_object);
00187     if (!err) {
00188         o = getObject(sought_object);
00189         if (!o) egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObjects(): an object "
00190                                "with the name %s does not exist\n",sought_object.c_str());
00191     }
00192     return o;
00193 }
00194 
00195 EGS_Object *EGS_ObjectFactory::createSingleObject(EGS_Input *i,
00196         const char *funcname, bool unique) {
00197     if (!i) {
00198         egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createSingleObject(): null input?\n");
00199         return 0;
00200     }
00201     string type;
00202     int err = i->getInput("type",type);
00203     if (!err) {
00204         for (unsigned int j=0; j<known_objects.size(); j++) {
00205             if (i->compare(type,known_objects[j]->getObjectType())) {
00206                 EGS_Object *o = known_objects[j]->createObject(i);
00207                 if (addObject(o,unique)) {
00208                     return o;
00209                 }
00210                 EGS_Object::deleteObject(o);
00211                 return 0;
00212             }
00213         }
00214     }
00215     string libname;
00216     int error = i->getInput("library",libname);
00217     if (error) {
00218         if (err) egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObject(): \n"
00219                                 "  input item %s does not define an object type or an object "
00220                                 "library\n",i->name());
00221         else egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObject(): input item %s\n"
00222                             "  don't know anything about object type %s and no object"
00223                             "library defined\n",i->name(),type.c_str());
00224         return 0;
00225     }
00226     EGS_Library *lib = 0;
00227     for (unsigned int j=0; j<libs.size(); j++) {
00228         if (libname == libs[j]->libraryName()) {
00229             lib = libs[j];
00230             break;
00231         }
00232     }
00233     if (!lib) {
00234         lib = new EGS_Library(libname.c_str(),dso_path.c_str());
00235         lib->load();
00236         if (!lib->isLoaded()) {
00237             egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObject(): "
00238                        "failed to load the library %s from %s\n",
00239                        libname.c_str(),dso_path.c_str());
00240             return 0;
00241         }
00242         libs.push_back(lib);
00243     }
00244     EGS_ObjectCreationFunction create;
00245     const char *fname = funcname ? funcname : "createObject";
00246     create = (EGS_ObjectCreationFunction) lib->resolve(fname);
00247     if (!create) {
00248         egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::createObject():\n"
00249                    "  failed to resolve the '%s' function in the library %s\n",
00250                    fname,lib->libraryName());
00251         return 0;
00252     }
00253     EGS_Object *o = create(i,this);
00254     if (addObject(o,unique)) {
00255         return o;
00256     }
00257     EGS_Object::deleteObject(o);
00258     return 0;
00259 }
00260 
00261 bool EGS_ObjectFactory::addObject(EGS_Object *o, bool unique) {
00262     if (!o) {
00263         egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::addObject(): attempt to add a null"
00264                    " object\n");
00265         return false;
00266     }
00267     for (unsigned int j=0; j<objects.size(); j++) {
00268         if (objects[j] == o) {
00269             return true;
00270         }
00271     }
00272     if (unique) {
00273         for (unsigned int j=0; j<objects.size(); j++) {
00274             if (o->getObjectName() == objects[j]->getObjectName()) {
00275                 egsWarning("EGS_ObjectFactory::addObject(): an object with "
00276                            "the name %s already exists\n",o->getObjectName().c_str());
00277                 //if( o->deref() == -1 ) delete o;
00278                 return false;
00279             }
00280         }
00281     }
00282     //egsWarning("adding an object with name '%s' of type '%s' at 0x%x\n",
00283     //        o->getObjectName().c_str(),o->getObjectType().c_str(),o);
00284     objects.push_back(o);
00285     o->setFactory(this);
00286     return true;
00287 }
00288 
00289 bool EGS_ObjectFactory::haveObject(const EGS_Object *o) const {
00290     for (unsigned int j=0; j<objects.size(); j++) {
00291         if (objects[j] == o) {
00292             return true;
00293         }
00294     }
00295     return false;
00296 }
00297 
00298 EGS_Object *EGS_ObjectFactory::getObject(const string &name) {
00299     for (unsigned int j=0; j<objects.size(); j++) {
00300         if (name == objects[j]->getObjectName()) {
00301             return objects[j];
00302         }
00303     }
00304     return 0;
00305 }
00306 
00307 EGS_Object *EGS_ObjectFactory::takeObject(const string &name) {
00308     for (vector<EGS_Object *>::iterator i = objects.begin();
00309             i != objects.end(); i++) {
00310         if ((*i)->getObjectName() == name) {
00311             (*i)->deref();
00312             objects.erase(i);
00313             return *i;
00314         }
00315     }
00316     return 0;
00317 }
00318 
00319 void EGS_ObjectFactory::addKnownTypeId(const char *typeid_name) {
00320     if (!typeid_name) {
00321         return;
00322     }
00323     for (int j=0; j<known_typeids.size(); j++)
00324         if (known_typeids[j] == typeid_name) {
00325             return;
00326         }
00327     known_typeids.push_back(typeid_name);
00328 }
